mapper.insert: insert into cart (memberId, productsId, productsName, productsIMG, productsPrice, reservation, purchasetime, endtime) values ( #{memberId}, #{productsId}, #{productsName}, #{productsIMG}, #{productsPrice}, #{reservation}, to_date(#{purchasetime}, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:SS'), to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:SS') )
